## assertIsString() function

Test whether a value is a string, and throw an informative error if it's not

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function assertIsString(arg: unknown, label: string): asserts arg is string;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  arg | <code>unknown</code> |  |
|  label | <code>string</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`asserts arg is string`
